column4: how active is the LTS branch?  how stable is feisty?  any recommendation for a new to ubuntu user?
more specifically... are enough people using the lts version so that I can get help if I need it?  If i plan on relying on irc and forums, what version would you suggest?
yeah, LTS is still alive and well.  Uh, Feisty (or Edgy) have newer versions of software (firefox 2, etc), you might want that.
